title: Fucked...
content: So I just got my admission in PES EC campus and when I went for PES hostel they said it's completely booked , went to the pg's near the campus and most are really bad for me as I need a bigger bed , are there anyone who's down to share a flate or something cause I'm from Udupi and my cousins live near yeshwantpur so kinda fucked.Rent doesn't matter as long as the place is decent.

comments.body: Hey I know a place where you can find proper accomodation and food nearby college. DM me through reddit
What the hostel is not full booked
I had called like 2 days ago warden said there are 50 percent of rooms available
That's what the warden told me when I visited the campus today
Are you taking about 1st year hostel or second?
Ammatra academy hostel ??
1st
No no no I'm a lateral entry student so I went to the in campus hostel
Ohh sorry got confused
Can second year students start there any chance ?

I'm pretty sure it's not booked completely. It never is. They usually save some for the further rounds of KCET counselling which would probably take a few more months. Even when I was in Amaatra, there was an entire wing in the third floor which was empty after all rounds of councelling. Confirm the availability with Pandu(Warden).

I'm pretty sure it's not booked completely. It never is. They usually save some for the further rounds of KCET counselling which would probably take a few more months. Even when I was in Amaatra, there was an entire wing in the third floor which was empty after all rounds of councelling. Confirm the availability with Pandu(Warden).
It is probable that the hostel is booked. We were warned about the lack of availability when the admissions began for the campus hostel since it's first come first serve. Unfortunate.
nope it is only for the first years
If you are looking for decent pg near college , there's one called Your Space (now named to Royal service apartment) it's pretty decent
Ig u can ask warden once DM for contact
Did you get in through pessat?? Or other exams?
Diploma cet
Check for pg's in neeladri nagar,They are quite decent

Guys I have doubt.  if I join pesu eee or pes(ec) ece through kcet will I be able to change my branch after 1st year to atleast ec campus cs. And will I be considered as management from 2nd year if I do change.
Guys
DCET guy ?
Yup
When are the classes starting?
August 5th apparently

Fuck whattttt
EC campus?

Did they send any message or anything?
Thats what they told me during admission s
ðŸ’€ lady at the reception told that they gonna send a message/mail within 12th August.
Lol are u a lateral entry student? Which branch cause i asked the people who did my admission and they told me ut was 5th august
Lateral entry student - CSE
Lateral entry student - CSE (my reddit's glitching)
Its august 5th too for you
